articles.title: Samsung will show off its expanded Micro RGB TV series at CES
articles.mainIdea: Samsung will show off its expanded Micro RGB TV series at CES
articles.summary: Engadget: Samsung will show off its expanded Micro RGB TV series at CES. Samsung has announced that it will be showing off an entire lineup of Micro RGB TVs at CES 2026 ranging from 55- to 115-inch models.

articles.title: The 2025 Energy Resurgence: 3 ETFs to Watch Before the Year Ends
articles.mainIdea: The 2025 Energy Resurgence: 3 ETFs to Watch Before the Year Ends
articles.summary: Zacks: The 2025 Energy Resurgence: 3 ETFs to Watch Before the Year Ends. Energy rebounds in 2025 as electrification and AI demand lift the sector. ETFs like VDE offer broad exposure to this revival. Related tickers mentioned: COP, CVX, FENY, RYDAF, SHEL, VENAX, XLE, XOM.
